titleStmt.title: [The boke of nurture for men, seruauntes, and chyldren]
titleStmt.author: Rhodes, Hugh, fl. 1550.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Rhodes by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: lacking all except signatures A₂₊A₃.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
